title: 10 year gift
body: i played a game on September 10th and i can't play for a while. Do i still get the gift?

replies.body:
Yes, you should be just fine. The official post states the following:

>Every League of Legends player who has played a game within the last couple of months will receive a new summoner icon along with the Riot Kayle skin. If you don’t own Kayle, you’ll get her, too. If you already own both, you’ll receive a mystery gift. Players who can’t receive mystery gifts will instead receive the RP value of a mystery gift in their region.

You can find the rest of the announcement [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you) Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello! Thanks in advance for the good work! Keep it up!
My question: When do we recieve the mystery gift? At the end of the weekend?
Greetings, babo7

I don't have an absolute date when rewards are rolling out to everyone since there are a few waves to ensure we get to everybody. The announcement states that if you don't have the gift by 9/23, to hit up player support about it.
Does it have to be a PVP game or can it be a CO-OP vs AI ?
The announcement doesn't specify, so I'm not really sure. I'd imagine it wouldn't matter the game type, though.
I got the icon, but i never got the mystery gift.
